metadata.title: gonicc Professional Hori Hori Garden Knife with Leather Sheath, Protective Handguard, High polished 440 Stainless Steel Blade, Sharpening Stone Included, for Weeding, Digging, Pruning, and Cultivating, Gardening Spades
features: High Polished 440 Stainless Steel Blade - The blade made from High polished 440 Stainless Steel is rust-proof, break-resistant and durable.

Measure Soil with Ease - The blade has a straight edge and a serrated edge, making it easy to saw through tough roots. Easily cuts into soil, with a depth scale marked on one side, so you know exactly how deep you're digging.

Ergonomic And Durable Handle - Long-lasting full tang handle kept in place by 3 metal rivets. The handle made with a 5-inch sturdy hardwood fits well in your hands. And it allows you to maintain a firm grip even for long hours of use.

Safety And Easily Store - Protective handguard makes your hand safe and prevents your hand from slipping while using as the blade is sharp. And equipped with a thick leather sheath which could be attached to your belt if you like, and the handle also has a hang hole for easy storage.
Durable and Stable - The high-quality construction ensures that the products will last you for years to come.
description: Check out the benefits of Gonicc Professional Garden Knife:
- The blade made from High polished 440 Stainless Steel is rust-proof, break-resistant and durable.

- The blade has a straight edge and a serrated edge, making it easy to saw through tough roots. Easily cuts into soil, with a depth scale marked on one side, so you know exactly how deep you're digging.

- Long-lasting full tang handle kept in place by 3 metal rivets. The handle made with a 5-inch sturdy hardwood fits well in your hands. And it allows you to maintain a firm grip even for long hours of use.
- Protective handguard makes your hand safe and prevents your hand from slipping while using as the blade is sharp.
- Equipped with a thick leather sheath which could be attached to your belt if you like, and the handle also has a hang hole for easy storage.
CLICK ADD TO CART AND ORDER YOURS TODAY!
